condition. The structure the specified drive unit AE50 full electric injection molding

around the specified drive unit AE50 full electric injection molding machine

(3) Vibration and impacting
The installation the specified drive unit AE50 full electric injection molding
machine can not vibrate; the vibration should controlled under
with some damping measure. The installation the drive unit can not undertake
the over-pressure and impacting.

Chapter Two Installation
2.3 Servo Motor Installation
Never knock the motor shaft encoder, prevent the motor from vibrating impacting.
not drag the motor shaft, leading-out cable encoder when moving the motor.
The motor shaft can not undertaken the overloading; otherwise, the motor may
damaged.
Installation environment
(1) Defense
The GSK SJT series servo motor not water-proof, and therefore prevent the
liquid from splashing the motor, and avoid the oil water entering the motor from
its leading wire and motor shaft.
Note: user needs the water-proof motor, better give indication.
(2) Temperature, humidity
The ambient temperature holds -20°C ~+40°C (without freeze). The motor may
heat due the long-term operation; better radiating the motor the narrow
space the heat equipment around it.
The humidity should less than 90%RH and without condensation.
(3) Vibration
The servo motor should avoided install the vibration situation, and the
vibration should less than equals 0.5G (4.9m/s’).
Installation method
(1) Installation method
The SJT series motor uses flange installation method, and motor installation
direction arbitrary.
(2) Installation notice
Never knock the motor motor shaft when disassembling the belt wheel
prevent the encoder from damaging. better disassemble the
screw-type push/pull tool.

--- Page 26 ---
~The Specified Drive Unit AE50 Full Electric Injection Molding Machine User Manual
SJT series motor can not endure huge axis/radial direction loading.
recommended connect the loading with spring coupling.
The motor should fixed check washer prevent the motor from
loosening.

Installation environment
(1) Defense
The GSK SJT series servo motor not water-proof, and therefore prevent the liquid from
splashing the motor, and avoid the oil water entering the motor from its leading wire and
motor shaft.
Note: user needs the water-proof motor, better give indication.
(2) Temperature, humidity
The ambient temperature holds -20°C ~+40°C (without freeze). The motor may heat due
the long-term operation; better radiating the motor the narrow space the heat
equipment around it.
The humidity should less than 90%RH and without condensation.

The specified drive unit and motor AE-80 full injection molding machine can touched after its
power turned off for 5min prevent the electric shock and burn.

removes according the alarm code.

parameter etc. Refer the following button functions:

repeated speed is.

nixie-tube the most right one flashes, which means the alarm occurs.

includes operation methods; the one the function menu under each operation method.

2.2 The Appearance Dimension and Installation Drive Unit
The specified drive unit AE-100 full electric injection molding machine should
installed inside the electric cabinet with perfect protection
The specified drive unit AE-100 full electric injection molding machine should
installed according the specified direction and interval guarantee good radiating
condition.
Never install on/clear the flammable material avoid fire hazard.
Installation environment
(1) Defense
The structure the specified drive unit AE-100 full electric injection molding machine
without defense, and therefore, should installed inside the electric cabinet with good
protective avoid touching the corrosive flammable gas; prevent the conducting material,
metal dust, oil mist and liquid from entering it.
(2) Temperature, humidity
Environment temperature 0°C~+55°C, the consecutive safety working temperature
below the 45°C. order guarantee the ambient temperature around the specified drive unit
AE-100 full electric injection molding machine not consecutively raised, the draft should
blown the radiator the drive unit.
(3) Vibration and impact
The installation the specified drive unit AE-100 full electric injection molding machine
can not vibrate; the vibration should controlled under 0.5G (4.9m/s2) with some damping
measure. The installation the drive unit can not undertake the over-pressure and impacting.
Appearance dimension
The AE-100 full electric injection molding machine produced GSK suitable for one power
module and drive modules, which separately corresponds DTSO2A-POW, DTS01A-50,
DTS01A-100, DTSO2A-200 and DTS02A-450. User can adapt the baseplate panel installation
methods, and the installation direction vertical the installation face upward (Refer the Fig.
2-1 The dimension figure drive unit installation board aperture).

Installation method
(1) Installation method
The SJT series motor uses flange installation method, and motor installation direction
arbitrary.
(2) Installation notice
Never knock the motor motor shaft when disassembling the belt wheel prevent the
encoder from damaging. better disassemble the screw-type push/pull tool.
SJT series motor can not endure huge axis/radial direction loading.
recommended connect the loading with spring coupling.
The motor should fixed check washer prevent the motor from loosening.

Chapter Product Introduction
CHAPTER PRODUCT INTRODUCTION
The GR-L series bus servo drive unit (hereinafter referred the servo unit),
developed and manufactured GSK CNC Equipment Co., Ltd., supports the GSK-Link
bus protocol.
Basic features this series servo unit:
The control algorithms the permanent-magnet synchronous servo motor and
asynchronous spindle servo motor are integrated, the motor parameters can set adapt
the permanent-magnet synchronous servo motor and asynchronous spindle servo motor.
Due the high-speed real-time communication with the CNC through GSK-Link fieldbus, the
connection simplified, and the transmission distortion analog signals and pulse signals can
avoided. The servo unit also supports the real-time monitoring, parameter management and servo
parameter tuning through the CNC
Various control modes are supported: position, speed, position/speed and torque control modes.
Two position feedback input interfaces are provided, supporting encoder communication protocols
(e.g. BISS, Endat2.2 and Tamagawa) and incremental encoders. The absolute incremental
grating rulers can connected for full closed-loop control.
This product has strong overload drive capability and large brake pipe capacity. can
connected with the external brake resistor, with high starting and braking speeds.
Three voltage levels, i.e. 220V, 380V and 440V are available adapt different power grids.

1.3.2 Ordering Instructions For GR-L Series Product
Required: Model and quantity the ordered products (servo unit, servo motor, isolation
transformer and CNC). The product may supplied based the dedicated software and
hardware version. required, the optional features and accessories must described the
order.
Required: Varieties, specifications and quantities non-standard accessories (e.g. special cable
cable length, and cable fabrication process); otherwise, standard accessories will supplied.
Required: Code the shaft extension, structure type and outgoing line type the ordered servo
motor. Special items need described the order
When only the servo unit ordered, the “matching servo motor model” must added behind
the servo unit model, [Example: GR2030-LA1- (130SJT-MO60D(A4I Y1))], that the matching
parameters the servo unit can set based the motor model before delivery. The parameters
the servo unit must match those the servo motor, order achieve good control effects. The
servo motor that not supplied GSK must not used without the confirmation the
R&D Department GSK.
The spindle servo drive unit and spindle servo motor the 3-phase AC440V power input
are out stock. They must produced according the order.

CHAPTER INSTALLATION
2.1 Installation Environment Requirements
The environment where the GR-L series bus-type servo drive unit installed has direct
impact its normal operation and service life. Please install the product correctly according the
following instructions.
Install the product place without water droplets, steam, dust and oily dust.
Install the product place without corrosive and flammable gases, metal
particles conductive dust.
Note Install the product place without heat electromagnetic noise interference.
Install the product electrical cabinet with ventilation, moisture-proof and
dust-proof facilities.
Keep the product away from the surfaces flammable materials avoid fires.
The installation place should convenient for maintaining and checking.

2.3 Installation Interval
The GR-L series bus-type servo drive unit installed the base plate, perpendicular
the mounting surface. Make the front side face the front and top face up, order facilitate heat
dissipation. Provide the necessary spacing around the servo unit.
When multiple servo units are used, the intervals should maximized during installation,
provide good cooling conditions.

The GR-L series bus-type servo drive unit connected the CNC system supporting
GSK-Link through CN4 and CNS5 interfaces for high-speed real-time communication with the CNC
system.
The GR-L series bus-type servo drive unit must correctly set with the following parameters,
order establish the Ethernet communication with the CNC system.

5.5 Servo Tuning
After the motor connected the mechanical load, the load inertia very important factor
relative the inertia the motor rotor. determines the rigidity motor operation. the field CNC
machine tools, the servo motor must have stable and high rigidity order achieve good machining
effects. When servo tuning conducted according the method this section, the accurate inertia
ratio (PA179) can calculated, and then group recommended rigidity parameters (PA15, PA16
and PA19) can set automatically. This not only simplifies the debugging the servo rigidity the
machine tool, but also avoids the previous debugging based the experience debugging
personnel.

trap
Mechanical systems usually involve large part tolerances, assembly gaps, part frictions, and
certain dynamic imbalances, which will lead inherent vibration the machine. Resonance
may occur when the vibration frequency the motor certain speed close the
inherent vibration frequency the machine. this case, the trap can applied suppress
resonance.
The trap capable reducing the gain specific frequency suppress
mechanical resonance. The accurate resonance frequency must available
order use the trap correctly. Where the resonance frequency often subject
deviation, the trap will not apply. Hence, the trap suitable for resonance.
The greater the trap width and depth, the strong capabilities resonance
suppression will be. However, the phase lag may occur, resulting system
instability. Thus, the parameters can modified properly suppress vibration.
Key points for trap use:
When PA77 the “real-time detection resonance frequency” the servo unit will
enabled. The detected frequency shown the PA76 parameters and dP-rPS
Note Due the real-time calculation, the program running time long, flickering the LED display
normal.
Note recommended run the machine tool the entire stroke, order obtain the resonance
frequency with the largest amplitude.
Write the frequency value displayed PA76 into PA78 enable resonance suppression.
resonance not suppressed completely, PA78, PA79 and PA80 can subject fine
adjustment obtain good suppression effects.
After the suppression the first group frequencies, the servo unit will still automatically
detect the resonance frequency and the detected frequency will still displayed PA76.
the case different from the previous frequency, the frequency value can written
into PA81, followed the suppression the second group frequencies. Similarly, fine
adjustment can conducted PA82 and PA83 the case incomplete suppression.
After the resonance suppression, set PA77 and save it. Another purpose disable
the function real-time frequency detection, order save the program running time.
Note PA77 not set, the servo unit will continue detecting the real-time resonance frequency. lot
servo resources will consumed for data calculation, which will inevitably cause the decline the
performance the servo unit.

Because the grating ruler installed the guide rail, the table movement corresponds the
displacement grating ruler. When the closed-loop position control performed based this
value, not necessary consider the transmission ratio the motor shaft and grating ruler.
For the calculation the electronic gear ratio, since the minimum equivalent the position
command the CNC system corresponds one pulse the position loop the servo unit, the
grating ruler step (the minimum position measured the grating ruler) corresponds the
control equivalent one pulse the servo unit. Therefore, only the minimum equivalent the
system position command needs matched with the grating ruler step.

Level program can also directly cite the state these signals for corresponding
processing.

Level program input signal latch also called the synchronous input signal memory
Level Il. The stored input signal specially used for Level program processing. The
signal state this memory synchronous with the Level signal state.
Only when the Level program executed, signals from input memory and machine
input memory can latched the Level program input memory. During the entire
execution process Level program, the signal state the latch remains unchanged.

Chapter PLC Basic Code
Sequential program design starts from the preparation ladder diagram. The ladder diagram
composed relay contact and function code. The logic relationship represented the ladder
diagram constitutes the sequential program. There are two ways input the sequential program:
One input method use the mnemonic language (The PLC command codes RD, AND,
are not supported this system); and the other method use relay symbol. When relay
symbol used, you can conduct programming with the ladder diagram format without
understanding the PLC code format.
Actually, even the sequential program input relay symbol method, converted
corresponding PLC code the system.

Content and operation “Setting” interface signal tracking
(1) Mode:
Periodic cycle: Sample each time period.
Signal change: Sample when the signal changed.
(2) Resolution:
Input the sampling resolution. The default value the minimum resolution ms), and the range
1,000 ms).
The input value multiple ms.
(3) Time limit:
This parameter will displayed when the sampling mode set “Periodic Cycle”. Input the
execution time tracking. The “Resolution” value number specified signal addresses
determines the value range “Periodic Cycle”. The range displayed the right side.
(4) Frame limit:
This parameter will displayed when the sampling mode set “Signal Change”. Input
number samples. The range displayed the right side.
(5) Stopping conditions:
None: not stop tracking.
Full buffer zone: tracking when the buffer zone full.
Signal triggering: Trigger the stopping tracking via signal.
Trigger setting: This parameter valid when the “Stopping Conditions” set “Signal
Trigger’.
Address: The input signal address serves the stopping trigger. (The address
cannot serve the stopping trigger)
Mode: Decide the trigger mode stop tracking.
Rising edge: Automatically stop tracking through the rising edge trigger signal.
Falling edge: Automatically stop tracking through the falling edge trigger signal.
Any change: Automatically stop tracking through the rising edge falling edge
trigger signal.
(6) Sampling conditions: This parameter will work when the sampling mode set “Signal
Change”. Decide the sampling conditions.
Signal triggering: Sample the signal when there any change specified mode the
signal designated the trigger address set sampling conditions.
Any change: Sample the signal when there any change the signal designated the
trigger address set sampling conditions.
Trigger setting: This parameter will work when the sampling mode set “Signal Change”,
and the sampling conditions are set “Signal Trigger’.
Address: The input signal address serves the sampling trigger signal. (The address

signal.

signal.
Any change: Sample the specified signal state through the rising edge falling
edge trigger signal.
Connected: Sample the specified signal state when the trigger signal
connected.
Disconnected: Sample the specified signal state when the trigger signal
disconnected.

operation panel set the machine will move continuously along the selected
axis the selected direction.
Incremental feed the incremental mode, when the feed axis and direction selection signal
the machine operation panel set the machine will move one step along the
selected axis the selected direction. The minimum movement distance the
machine the minimum input incremental, and each step has 10, 100 1,000
times minimum input incremental value.
The only difference between JOG feed and incremental feed the mode for
selecting feed distance. JOG feed, when such feed axis and direction selection
signals +J1, -J1, +J2, -J2, +J3, -J3 are set the machine can through
continuous feed. incremental feed, the machine adopts step feed. The JOG feed
speed override plate can used adjust the JOG feed speed.
Through the fast feed selection switch, the machine moves the fast feed speed,
which irrelevant the JOG feed speed override signal.

Overview Based the control method, the GSK218MC series spindle divided to: gear spindle
and analog spindle.
the gear spindle mode, CNC controls the spindle speed converting code
switching value and outputting the spindle.
the gear spindle mode, CNC controls the spindle speed converting code

Overview Analog spindle means that the spindle speed controlled the analog voltage value

The actually-output analog voltage equal the value spindle-controlled value

8.3 Backing Rigid Tapping
Overview When the system performs rigid tapping, the tap may not retracted the outside the
workpiece due power failure emergency stop. order more conveniently and
quickly withdraw the tap that has been tapped into the workpiece, the backing rigid
tapping therefore born. This function will automatically store the last tapping processing
information. After the signal the tapping back turned on, the system performs the
retracting action the corresponding rigid tapping cycle according the stored information,
and retracts the tap that breaks into the workpiece point specified the tapping
command.
Execution:
Eliminate all alarms and put the system reset state 一 select MDI operation mode press
[Spindle exact stop] button turn rigid tapping backing RTNT signal system
performs retraction with last tapping parameter spindle rotation feed axis feeds retract
point (tapping retraction completion point) rigid tapping retraction completed and
RTNT signal becomes RTPT tapping retraction completed and signal becomes 一
normal operation axis tool retracts the starting point.
Start
Select MDI mode the reset state, press the [Spindle exact stop] button, the tapping
backing function start signal RTNT turned and the system starts perform
backing rigid tapping;
Complete
After the rigid tapping backing completed, the rigid tapping backing start signal RTNT
turned off and the rigid tapping backing completion signal RTPT signal turned
the tapping backing action terminated, and the system the reset state. Other normal
operations may executed this time;

8.4 Contour Control Method
Overview The servo spindle can positioned, interpolated with other servo axes, and linearly
interpolated between the spindle and the servo axis after receiving the instructions.
The case where the spindle speed the servo spindle controlled called spindle rotation 和
control (the spindle rotated the speed command S); the case where the position the
spindle controlled called spindle contour control (the spindle rotated the movement
command). contour control function involves contour control the spindle.
Switching between spindle rotation control and contour control depends the output
signal from the PLC. The manual and automatic operation the contour control axis
the same the normal servo axis the contour control mode.
8.4.1 Contour Control Axis Setting
When the position parameter (No37#7 SCS)=“1", contour control function effective, and
contour the spindle may controlled. The axis that performs contour control configured
one the CNC control axes.
Note: The system fixes the 5th axis the contour axis and the number CNC control axes
must set and this number cannot changed.
8.4.2 Switching Between Spindle Rotation Control and Contour Control
Switching from spindle rotation control contour control; When the contour control
switching signal CON (G033#4) "1", the spindle becomes the contour control axis.
When switching contour control performed during spindle rotation, the spindle stops
immediately and switching performed.
Switching from contour control spindle rotation control; When the contour control
switching signal CON (G033#4) "0", the spindle becomes the spindle rotation control axis.
The switching performed after confirming that the movement command the spindle for
both the automatic operation and the manual operation has been completely ended. alarm
issued when switching performed during the movement the spindle.
8.4.3 Contour Control Axis Setting For Interpolation
For servo axes that are interpolated with the contour control axis, axes can
selected, and only linear interpolation available.
8.4.4 Contour Control Axis Reference Point Returning
When the position parameter (No37#5 CsZR)=“0”, the reference point return function the
contour control axis invalid. After the spindle rotation control mode successfully switched the

--- Page 112 ---
GSK218MC Machining Center CNC System PLC and Installation Connection Manual
contour control mode, the CNC sets the current point zero (when the series spindle servo
unit adapted, the mode under which the servo unit switched the speed mode from the position
mode shall selected and the servo unit will oriented the set position. For the position
setting, please refer the Series Spindle Servo Unit Manual).
When the position parameter (No37#5 CsZR)=“1”", the reference point return function the
contour control axis valid.
Operating procedures:
Manual operation mode
After the servo spindle switched the contour control mode, the spindle starts
reference point return operation when the feed axis direction selection signal (G100#4)
set "1" the reference point return mode. After the reference point positioned, the
reference point return completion signal ZP5 (F094#4) becomes "1".
Automatic operation mode
G00 command
After the servo spindle switched the contour control mode, the servo spindle
performs the reference point return operation when the GOO command executed
without performing the reference point return operation. the case GOO command,
the servo spindle returns the reference point. After the reference point return
completed, the reference point return completion signal ZP5 (F094#4) becomes "1" and
positioned the command position. The GOO command that executes one more
reference point return operations becomes the normal positioning operation.
The difference between GOO based reference point return and G28-based manual
reference point return that, the reference point always positioned the manual and
全 G28-based reference point return operation，while the case G00, the arbitrary
command position can located.
G28 command
After the servo spindle switched contour control mode, the case command
G28, the spindle moves the intermediate point after the spindle motor stops. Then,
the reference point return operation performed, and after the reference point
positioned, the reference point return completion signal ZP5 (F0946#4) becomes "1".
When performing reference point return operation after the servo spindle switched
the contour control mode, perform the operation positioning the reference
point and set ZP5 "1".
Reference point return interrupt
Inthe manual operation mode, the reference point return operation can interrupted
when the reset, emergency stop, feed axis direction selection signal set "0". The
reference point return operation after the interruption re-executed from the beginning.
Inthe automatic operation mode, the operation can interrupted reset, emergency
stop, feed hold, and on. any case, the reference point return operation after the
interruption re-executed from the beginning.

method, the axis does not operate control axis. alarm issued during automatic

addition, regarding manual operation with respect the contour control axis, please process

8.5 PMC Axis Control Mode
Overview The axis detached from the CNC parameter setting, that longer receives the
CNC command. Instead, sends the running command data the axis through the PLC,
and performs the function the specified action. The PLC axis runs independently and
does not interlock interpolate with the CNC axis. The system can control PLC axes,
which are generally used for the control equipment such indexing table and servo tool
magazine. Control functions that can implemented via the PLC axis:
Rapid movement
Return the reference point
Select machinery coordinate system
Note: PLC axis control realizes various control functions through PLC command control signals, and CNC
provides set input/output signal group for PLC axis control
Step
(1) Set the control axis the PLC axis control parameter P800/P805/P811/P815;
(2) Adopt the PLC directly control the axis. Set the control axis selection signals
EAX1-EAX4 "1" according the set group number, and separate them from the CNC
management become the PLC axis. The minimum unit the control axis for PLC axis
control set parameter P801/P806/P812/P816.
(3) Specify the PLC axis perform the action. The axis control command signals ECOg-EC6g
全 are used specify the type action, and the axis feed speed signals EIF0g-EIF15g are
used indicate the feed rate controlled the axis, and the axis control data signals
EIDOg-EID31g are used specify the amount movement other data. Above signal
and the program segment stop and prohibition signal specify the command for program
segment. These signals are collectively referred axis control program segment data
signals.
(4) When the designation the set data operation program segment completed, the
current logic the axis control command signal EBUFg inverted. the previous EBUFg
itis set the previous EBUFg set The axis control command read
completion signal EBSYg the CNC output signal must the same the logic the
signal EBUFg, otherwise cannot inverted.

(8) Program segment stop signal
Signal symbol: ESBKg (G142.3, G142.3)
Signal type: PLC program segment stop invalid signal Signal symbol: EMSBKg
(G143.7, G167.7)
Signal type: PLC
Signal function: stop disable the stop for each program segment. When the program 志
segment stop signal ESBkg set during the execution the command
from the PLC, the axis control stopped when the program segment currently
being executed ends. When the program segment stop signal ESBKg set
the buffered command executed. However, when the command program
segment stop and prohibition signal EMSBKg the program segment stop
signal ESBKg invalid.
(9) place signal
Signal symbol: EINPg (F136.0, F139.0)
Signal type:
Signal function: indicates whether the PLC axis the in-place status. This signal
becomes when the axis controlled the PLC the in-place state. When
the deceleration state during axis movement, the in-place detection
performed, and the next command will not executed until the in-place width
reached.
(10) Alarm signal (PMC axis control)
Signal symbol: EIALg (F130.2, F133.2, F136.2, F139.2)
Signal type: NC->PLC
Signal function: indicates the alarm status associated with PLC axis control. This signal
becomes when servo alarm, over-travel alarm, alarm occurs the axis
controlled the PLC. When the alarm released the following operations
and the reset signal ECLRg set the signal For servo alarm, please
eliminate the cause the alarm and reset the CNC. For over-travel alarms,
please move the axis within the limit the stored travel and reset the CNC.
Commands for moving the axis within the limit the stored travel the
over-travel alarm, such rapid movement (ECOg-EC6g).
(11) Axis movement signal (PMC axis control)
Signal symbol: EGENg 130.4, F133.4, F136.4, F139.4)
Signal type:
Signal function: indicates movement status the axis.
(12) Return-to-zero completion signal
Signal symbol: Reference point return completion signal ZP1-ZP5 (F094.0-F094.4)
Signal type: PLC

Spindle control: some fixed cycles, required output the spindle code for reverse
rotation.
The following fixed cycles require spindle control.
Reverse tapping cycle G74; Fine boring cycle G76

For spindle control, the following common auxiliary functions are used:
Refer the description auxiliary functions.
M03: main shaft clockwise rotate
M04: main shaft anticlockwise rotate
MO5: Spindle stop
M19: Spindle orientation
Tapping signal: The tapping signal output during the tapping cycle. The tapping signal
also output when the tapping cycle code valid.
Override: Cutting feed override always set 100% during tapping.
Feed suspension: When the feed suspension button pressed during tapping, the
movement does not stop immediately. But when the tool returns the plane,the
movement stops.
Dry running: TDR (parameter 12#5) defines whether the dry running during tapping
valid.

11.1 Skip Function
OverviewAs with G01, the axis motion specified after the G31 code, and linear interpolation can
commanded. external skip signal input during the execution this command, the
execution the command interrupted for the execution the next program segment.
The skip function used when the measurement end point not programmed but
finished with signal command from the machine tool. For example, may used for the
grinding. The skip function can also used measure the workpiece size.
The coordinate values when the skip signal turned can used the user macro
program, because they are stored the system variables #5016 #5019 the user macro
program follows:

#5017 Y-axis program segment end position
#5018 Z-axis program segment end position
#5019 4TH-axis program segment end position

2.5.2 Interface Signal Description
VCMD+, VCMD-: analog command input 10V -10V +10V (determined
parameters);
Spindle output signal: SON spindle enable, SFR spindle forward rotation, SRV spindle reverse
rotation, STAO spindle orientation, SPO positioning selection, speed/position switching;
Spindle input signal: SAR spindle speed reaching, ZSP spindle zero speed detection, COIN
spindle positioning completed, AxisALM alarm input, VPO speed/position switching
completed;
PA+, PA-, PB+, PB-, PZ+, PZ-: pulse signal the spindle encoder;
PULS+, PULS-: pulse command output under position mode;
SIGN+, SIGN-: direction command output under position mode.
Note: the bus interface the new I/O board the RJ45. The spindle port has 2nd analog voltage and the pin
29:2 VCMD+.

3.2.1 Input Interface Circuit
The input signals are signals from the machine tool the CNC. They come from the buttons
the machine side, the limit switches, the contacts the relays, etc.
The contacts the machine side should meet the following conditions:
Contact capacity: above DC30V and 16mA;
Leakage current between contacts case open circuit: below 1mA (voltage 26.4V);
Voltage drop between contacts case closed circuit: below (voltage 8.5mA, including
voltage drop the cable).

Chapter Machine Tool Debugging This chapter introduces some methods and steps GSK218MC system installation, debugging 4.1 Debugging Preparation GSK218MC debugging may performed the following steps System connection: correct connection the basis for the smooth debugging the system; PLC debugging: validate system security function (such emergency stop, hard limit, etc.) and operation function; Driver unit parameter setting: set motor model, parameters, control methods, etc. System parameter setting: set control parameters, speed parameters, etc. Data backup: after the system debugged, data backup such parameter backup, compensation data backup, and backup PLC program shall performed. Precautions before GSK218MC debugging and operation ensure that all cables are properly connected, check the polarity the freewheeling diodes the relay, solenoid valve, etc. Check the connection phase sequence the motor high-voltage cable; One-to-one correspondence between position control cable, code wheel feedback cable and motor high-voltage cable servo feed device; Confirm the type analog voltage code received the spindle unit; Confirm that all ground wires are connected reliably; Confirm the validity the emergency stop button and the emergency stop circuit. Make sure the feed can disconnected after the emergency stop button pressed the emergency Press the emergency stop button ensure that all air switches the system are disconnected; Close the main power air switch the electric cabinet; Turn the 24V air switch fuse check whether the DC24V power supply normal; Check the power supply other parts; Power the GSK218MC control unit. 4.3 Emergency Stop and Limit This system has the software limit function. 4.7.13 Rotary Axis Pitch Error Compensation
The respective (two-way) compensation and absolute value compensation modes the rotary
axis are the same the linear axis. The compensation method the same, but must comply with the
rotary axis characteristics. For details, see “4.7.9 Incremental value compensation rotary axis mean
value (one-way) compensation mode”.
4.8 Mechanical Zeroing (Machine Tool Zeroing)
Mechanical zero (machine tool zero) concept
The machine tool coordinate system the inherent coordinate system the machine tool. The
origin the machine tool coordinate system called the mechanical zero (or machine tool zero).
also called the reference point this manual. the mechanical origin specified the machine tool
manufacturer and usually installed the maximum travel the positive direction the X-axis,
Y-axis, Z-axis, 4TH axis, and 5TH axis. When the numerical control device powered on, the
mechanical zero not known, and automatic manual zeroing required generally.
There are two types zeroing modes: After the block; Before the block. set the

spindle rotation speed.
Parameter: P632 parameter tapping gear rotation speed set accordance with maximum [E@Ed

command direction, set GS/GR spindle servo parameter PA28
position mode, the rotation speed spindle inconsistent with command rotation speed,

calculate electronic gear ratio according P*G=N*C*4.

the gear ratio spindle and motor not 1:1, calculate corresponding gear ratio and enter
into parameter P696~P711 and P712~P727.
Make sure positive and negative rotation the spindle coincides with the rotation direction
screw tap during rigid tapping. Limit rotation speed fluctuation and allow for maximum
rotations error.
10. For cutting soft materials (such aluminum alloy and copper), use spiral screw tap, along
with coolant for better effect.
Il. Setting flexible tapping: Flexible tapping may realized two ways
position control mode (i.e. parameter NO:46#1 changed (position mode), K7#7 changed
(use spindle position mode)), with code M03/M04, realize flexible tapping.
speed control mode (i.e. parameter NO:46#1 changed (speed mode), K7#7 changed
(not use spindle position mode)), with code M03/M04, realize flexible tapping. Command
tapping the bottom hole through program, pause for better effect.
Note: This method applies gearless shift machine.

lll. Usage and Maintenance With Carousel Type Tool Magazine
Tool magazine installation and related PLC parameter settings
Operation purpose: align the ladder diagram with the tool magazine configuration.
The requirements the ladder diagram for machine tool with carousel type tool
magazine:
The machine tool has spindle tool automatic clamp/unclamp device, which
provided with normally open in-place detection switch.
The spindle has orientation function with the orientation angle adjustable.
The capacity the tool magazine less than 100.
The tool magazine can rotate forward and backward.
The tool magazine has counter switch, forward in-place detection switch, and
backward in-place detection switch.
The tool magazine has zero return switch (optional).

Alarming information: 1214 Spindle gear does not spin (A001.6)
Causes: Abnormal spindle gear detected when the spindle executing rotation code.
Solution: Check the first-gear in-place detection switch (X004.1) closed when the spindle 之
shifts first gear (i.e., Y3.4=1); the second-gear in-place detection switch (X004.2) closed
when the spindle shifts second gear (i.e., Y3.5=1); the third-gear in-place detection switch
(X004.3) closed when the spindle shifts third gear (i.e., Y3.6=1). alarm occurs when the 二
signal each gear being place not detected within the time set T0021.
Alarming information: 1215 Execute code before execution M06 code (A001.7)
Causes: valid code executed when executing M06 code.
Solution: Execute valid code before executing M06 code.
Alarming information: 1216 Tools released and spindle does not spin (A002.0)
Causes: Spindle rotation code executed when the tool release state, for example:
Pressing spindle forward rotation, backward rotation, inching and positioning manual mode
executing M03, M04, and M19 automatic mode will both cause the spindle rotate.
Solution: manually press “clamping/unclamping’” button enter into clamping state (YO.2=0),
check whether the tool test switch (X2.6) it’s there will alarm when rotating
spindle.
Alarming information: 1217 Spindle spinning tool can not released (A002.1)
Causes: Tool release code executed when the spindle rotation.
Solution: Execute tool release code when the spindle stopped avoid alarm.
Alarming information: 1218 Tool magazine stops abnormally, reconfirm tool number (A002.2)
Causes: When the Txx code executed and the magazine rotating, alarm occurs
pressing the “Reset” key will cause this alarm occur.
Solution: Tool magazine returns zero.

Alarming information: 1219 Spindle cannot rotated with the mechanical arm not being the
origin (A002.3)
Causes: Spindle rotation performed when the mechanical arm not the origin.
Solution: Return the mechanical arm origin (check whether the mechanical arm the
origin detecting the state X3.4).
For easy debugging for abort during mechanical arm running, the mechanical arm
can perform positioning the mechanical zero. When the mechanical arm not the
origin, necessary perform mechanical zeroing before positioning operation.

CNC system with carousel type tool magazine)

Causes: When clamping tools (i.e.: Y0.2=0), the magazine clamping detection switch (X2.6)
not closed within the time set T010.
Solution: Check the tool magazine clamping detection switch normal.

Ill. Usage and Maintenance With Mechanical Arm Tool Magazine
Tool magazine installation and related PLC parameter settings
Operation purpose: align the ladder diagram with the tool magazine configuration.
The requirements the ladder diagram for machine tool with disc type tool magazine
The machine tool has spindle tool automatic clamp/unclamp device, which
provided with normally open in-place detection switch.
The spindle has orientation function with the orientation angle adjustable.
The capacity the tool magazine less than 100.
The tool magazine can rotate forward and backward.
The tool magazine has counter switch, tool pot vertical in-place detection switch,
and tool pot horizontal in-place detection switch.
The tool magazine has zero return switch (optional).

Appendix Ill Ladder Diagram Configuration File Format
Appendix Ladder Diagram Configuration File Format
The signals the ladder diagram configuration file LadChixx.txt (“xx” corresponds the
running ladder diagram file number set the system) store the following information fixed
sequence.
Code and Meaning Signals X0.0-X5.7
Format: Xxxxx+Spacet+Chinese comment+Line break (Enter)
For example: “X0000 X-axis positive direction travel limit signal”
Where: “xxxx” the value this signal, for example, “O000 for 0.0” and “0067 for 6.7”, ranking
from top bottom 0000 0067 (i.e., signal 0.0 6.7), with the order unchangeable.
“Space” generally without mixing with other characters, the same below.
ll. Code and Meaning Signals Y0.0-Y5.7
Format: Yxxxx+Spacet+Chinese comment+Line break (Enter)
For example: “YOO0O Z-axis brake”
Where: “xxxx” the value this signal, for example,

Ill. Code and Meaning Signals K6.0-K63.7
Format: comment+Line break (Enter)
For example: “KOO60 X-axis limit switch used not”
Where: “xxxx” the value this signal, for example, “OO60 for 6.0” and “0637 for 63.7”,
ranking from top bottom 0060 0637 (i.e., signal 6.0 63.7), with the order unchangeable.
“Space” generally too, without mixing with other characters.
IV. Code and Meaning Signals A0.0-A63.7
Format: Axxxx+Space+Chinese comment+Line break (Enter)
For example: “A0000 Abnormal air pressure”
Where: “xxxx” the value this signal, for example, “0000 for 0.0” and “0317 for 63.7”,
ranking from top bottom 0000 0317 (i.e., signal 0.0 63.7), with the order unchangeable.
“Space” generally too, without mixing with other characters.

2.4.1 Machine Coordinate System
The specific point the machine that used the machining reference called the machine
zero. The machine manufacturer sets the machine zero for each machine. The coordinate system set
with the machine zero the origin called the machine coordinate system. After power turned on,
manual return the machine zero performed establish the machine coordinate system. Once
the machine coordinate system set, remains unchanged until the power turned off, the system
restarted, the emergency stop pressed.

2.4.1 Machine Coordinate System
The specific point the machine that used the machining reference called the machine
zero. The machine manufacturer sets the machine zero for each machine. The coordinate system set
with the machine zero the origin called the machine coordinate system. After power turned on,
manual return the machine zero performed establish the machine coordinate system. Once
the machine coordinate system set, remains unchanged until the power turned off, the system
restarted, the emergency stop pressed.
The system adopts the right-hand Cartesian coordinate system. The vertical movement the
spindle direction Z-axis movement. Viewing from the spindle the workpiece, the spindle box
Z-axis negative movement approaching workpiece and Z-axis positive movement leaving workpiece.
The remaining directions are determined the right-hand Cartesian coordinate system.

set the machine manufacturer. With the reference point return function the tool can easily moved
this position. Generally, the reference point the CNC milling machine system coincides with the
machine zero, and the machining center reference point usually the tool change point. 号

2.4.4 Absolute Coordinate Programming and Relative Coordinate Programming
There are two methods defining the axis movement amount: absolute value and relative value.
The absolute value definition method programming with the coordinates the end position
the axis movement, called absolute coordinate programming. The relative value definition method
directly programming with the axis movement amount, called relative coordinate programming (also
called incremental coordinate programming).

coordinate position which the tool moved.

4.2.4 Absolute Value/Incremental Value Programming G90/G91
Format: G90/G91
Function: There are two methods coding axis movement amount: absolute value coding and
incremental value coding.
The absolute value coding method programming with the coordinates the end
position the axis movement. the end position involves concept coordinate system,
please refer 2.4.1 2.4.4.
The incremental value coding method directly programming with the axis relative
movement amount. The increment value has nothing with the coordinate system. Just
give the movement direction and distance the end position relative the start position.
The absolute value code and the incremental value code are G90 and G91, respectively.

4.7.1 Tool Length Compensation (G43, G44, G49)
Function:
G43: specify the forward compensation tool length.
G44 specify the reverse compensation tool length.
G49: cancel the tool length compensation.
Format:
The system supports two tool length offset methods (A/B), and uses the position parameter NO:
39#0 set the tool length offset mode.
Method
ZH;
Method
G17 G43 Z_H;
G17 G44 Z_H;

G18 G44 Y_H;
G19 G43 X_H;
G19 G44 X_H;
Cancel the tool length offset mode: G49 HO.
Description:
The above code used move the final position specified axis command offset. The
difference between the tool length value assumed during programming (usually set the first
tool) and the tool length value used actual machining preset the offset memory, there
need change the program, and possible machine parts using tools different

lengths only changing tool length compensation value.
G43 and G44 are used specify different offset directions, and code specify the offset
number.
Offset direction
G43: Positive offset (most commonly used)
G44: Negative offset
Whether absolute value code incremental value code, case G43, the
coordinate value final position the specified axis movement command the program

replace the old one. For example:

immediately cancels the tool length compensation; after the command H00, the
compensation axis address compensation command must programmed, otherwise
the tool length compensation cannot canceled.

the offset all axes while HOO only used cancel the offset the axis
perpendicular the specified plane.
recommended add Z-axis movement code for establishment and cancellation

10. Interference check
ro) Excessive cutting the tool called “interference”. Interference can used pre-check
excessive tool cutting. The system will give alarm interference detected the syntax
check after the program loaded in. set Position Parameter NO: 41#6 whether
interference check performed during radius compensation.
Basic conditions for interference:
(1) The movement distance the program segment for tool radius compensation smaller
than the tool radius.
(2) The tool path direction different from the program path direction. (The angle between the
paths between 90° and 270°).
(3) During arc machining, addition the above conditions, the angle between the start point
and the end point the tool center path greatly different from the angle between the start
point and the end point the program path (180° more).

4.8.1 Feed Mode (G64/G61/G63)
Format:
Exact stop mode G61
Tapping mode G63
Cutting mode G64
Function:
Exact stop mode G61: once specified, this function remains valid until G62, G63 G64
specified. The tool decelerates the end point the program segment perform in-position
check and then executes the next segment.
Tapping mode G63: once specified, this function remains valid until G61, G62 G64
specified. The tool executes the next program segment without decelerating the end point
the current segment. When G63 specified, the feedrate override and feed hold are
invalid.
Cutting mode G64: once specified, this function remains valid until G61, G62 G63
specified. The tool executes the next program segment without decelerating the end point
the current segment.
Description:
parameter format.
G64 the default feed mode the system. The tool does not decelerate the end point
the program segment and directly executes the next segment.

placed within the specified range.

How use variables
Variables can used specify the parameter values user macro program itself. The value
variable can assigned the main program set LCD/MDI, assigned with the
result figured out when the user macro program itself executed.
Several variables can used, which are distinguished variable number.
(1) Representation variables
Use followed variable number represent the variable; the format follows:
#i(i=1,
(Example) #5, #109, #1005
(2) Reference variables
variable can replace the value after parameter value.
(Example) F#103 case #103=15, the same the F15 command.
G#130 case #130=3, the same G3.
Note: Reference variables not applicable the parameters and (program number and
sequence number). Programming with O#100, N#120 not allowed.
When exceeding the maximum code value specified the parameter, the variable
cannot used. case #30=120, M#30 exceeds the maximum code value.
Display and setting variable values: The value variable can displayed the
LCD screen, and can also set the MDI mode.
Classification variables
Variables can classified into empty variables, local variables, common variables, and [iy
system variables, which have different purposes and properties.
(1) Empty variables #0: (The variable always empty and value can assigned the
variable)
(2) Local variables #50: local variables can only used store data macro programs;
Position Parameter NO: 52#7 can used for reset setting determine whether delete 到
data after emergency stop. When macro program called, the local variables are
assigned independent variables.
(3) Common variables #100 #199, #500 #999: Position parameter NO: 52#6 can used for
reset settings determine whether eliminate the common variables #100 #199 after
emergency stop.
Common variables can shared the main program and all user macro programs called
the main program. That is, the variable used certain user macro program the same
used other macro programs. Therefore, the common variable result operation
certain macro program can used other macro programs.
there are rules about the purpose common variables the system, these variables can

5.1 Code Controlled PLC
When the code controlled PLC shares the same segment with the movement code, the
code will executed simultaneously with the movement code.
5.1.1 Spindle Rotation and Ccw Commands (M03, M04)
Code: M03 (M04)
Description: According applicable standards, the spindle rotation CCW defined forward
rotation and the rotation reverse rotation.
M03 means rotation while M04 means rotation CCW.
The code refers the speed the spindle, the gear position case gear control.
Unit: r/min
When controlled frequency converter, refers the actual speed, for example: $1000
means that the spindle rotates speed 1000 r/min.
5.1.2 Spindle Stop Code Command (M05)
Code: M05. When M05 executed automatically, the spindle will stop rotating. However the speed
吕 specified the code will reserved. The deceleration mode which the spindle stops
了 和 rotating depends the machine tool manufacturer’s settings. Usually, dynamic braking.
5.1.3 Cooling and Off (M08, M09)
己
Code: M08, make the cooling water pump on. M09, make the cooling water pump off. the automatic
mode, the auxiliary function lock used, the pump control code not executed.
5.1.4 A-Axis Unclamping and Clamping (M10, M11)
Code: M10, unclamping axis M11, clamping axis
5.1.5 Tool Control Unclamping and Clamping (M16, M17)
Code: M16, tool control unclamping M17, tool control clamping
5.1.6 Spindle Orientation and Cancellation (M18, M19)
Code: M18, cancel the spindle orientation M19, spindle orientation for tool replacement positioning
5.1.7 Tool Search Code Command (M21, M22)
Code: M21, tool search code when returning the tool; M22, tool search code when clamping the new
tool.
5.1.8 Tool Magazine Return Code Command (M23, M24)
Code: M23, which makes the tool magazine placed the spindle position; M24, which make the tool
magazine return the original position.
5.1.9 Rigid Tapping (M28, M29)
Code: M28, cancel rigid tapping M29, rigid tapping

5.2 Code For Program Control
The code for program control classified into main program control and macro program control.
When the code used for program control shares the same segment with the movement code, first
executed the movement code and then the code.
Note: M00, M01, M02, MO6, M30, M98, M99 codes cannot specified together with other codes,
otherwise the system will give alarm. When these codes share the same segment 区
with other non-M codes, first executed are the non-M codes and then the codes.
Such codes include those which cause CNC send the codes themselves the
machine tool and perform internal operations, such codes that invalidate the
read-ahead function program segment. addition, the codes, which only allow CNC
send the codes themselves the machine tool without performing internal operations,
can specified the same program segment.
5.2.1 Program End and Return (M30, M02)
the automatic operation mode, when the program runs M30 (M02), the automatic operation
will stop. After that, there any program that will not executed and the spindle and cooling
operation will stop, the number machined workpieces will increased M30 can use Position
Parameter NO: 33#4 control whether return the program header, and M02 can use Position
Parameter NO: 33#2 control whether return the program header. MO2 and M30 are the end
subprogram, will return the program calling the subprogram and continue execute the
following program segment.
5.2.2 Program Halt (M00)
the automatic operation mode, this mode will temporarily halted when the program runs
MOO, and the moment, the previous modal information will saved. When the loop start button
pressed, will continue running. Its function equivalent pressing down the feed hold button.
5.2.3 Selective Halt Program (M01)
the automatic operation mode, this mode can selectively halted when the program runs
M01. When the “Selection-stop” switch placed on, M01 and MOO have the same effect; the
“Selection-stop” switch off, MO1 has effect. Please refer Part Operation Instructions for
details.

7.4 Feed Speed Override Key
The feed override under manual mode and automatic mode can adjusted through the override
adjustment key the operation panel, with the range 0-200% (10% for each gear, gears total).
Under automatic mode, when the override adjustment key set zero, the system will stop feeding,
showing the cutting override zero; then the override adjustment key should adjusted keep the
program running.
7.5 Automatic Acceleration and Deceleration
The system drives the motor automatically accelerate and decelerate the beginning and end
movement; can start and stop smoothly. also automatically accelerates and decelerates when
the movement speed changes; the speed change can proceed smoothly. Therefore, there
need consider acceleration and deceleration when programming.
Fast feed: Forward acceleration and deceleration (0: linear; S-type) Post acceleration and
deceleration (0: linear; exponential type).
Cutting feed: Forward acceleration and deceleration (0: linear; S-type) Post acceleration and
deceleration (0: linear; exponential type).
Manual feed: Post acceleration and deceleration (0: linear; exponential type).
(Use parameters set the universal time constant each axis)

The machine normal condition.

Wires are connected properly and bound securely.

2.2 Power-Off
Before power-off, the following should confirmed:
X-axis, Y-axis and Z-axis CNC are stop state;
Auxiliary functions (such spindle and water pump) are closed;
First cut off the CNC power, then the machine power.
When powering off, check follows:
Check the LED the operation panel indicating that the cycle start stop state;
Check that all movable parts CNC machine are stop state;
Press POWER OFF (Power Off) button shut down.
Power off emergency
emergency, the power supply the machine can cut off immediately case accident.
However, must noted that there may deviation between the system coordinates and the actual
position after the power supply cut off, and operations such reset zero and tool alignment must
carried out.
Note: Please refer the machine manual the machine manufacturer for cutting off the power supply the
machine.

Press key reset the system:
All axial movements stop.

2.3.2 Emergency Stop
Press the emergency stop button during the machine operation, and the system enters the
emergency stop state. Then, the machine immediately stops movement. Release the emergency stop
button (although different from machine manufacturers, but usually automatically jumps
turning the button left) release emergency stop.
Note before releasing the emergency stop button, confirm whether the cause fault has been eliminated.
Note after the emergency stop button released, the operation returning the reference point should
performed again ensure the correctness the coordinate position.
Generally, the emergency stop signal the normally closed contact signal. When the contact
disconnects, the system will enter the emergency stop state and make the machine stop urgently. The
circuit connection emergency stop signal follows:
+24V

Operation keys:

key: Select the parameter item;

key: Enter the parameter value confirm and perform the operation;

Parameter item:
Plane: Select test planes G17, G18, G19;
Clockwise and counterclockwise circle: Select the circle direction G02, G03;
Sampling period: Set the sampling period according the radius the circle and the feed
speed. The larger the radius, the longer the sampling period should be; the
slower the feed speed, the longer the sampling period is;
feed speed: The movement speed when testing.
Magnification times: Roundness analysis for the error magnification.

3.4.5 Password Permission Setting and Modification
order prevent the processing program and CNC parameters from being maliciously modified,
the GSK218MC system provides the permission setting function. The password level divided into
levels from high low, including level (system manufacturer level), level (machine manufacturer
level), level (system debugging level), level (end user level) and level (processing level). The
default minimum level power-on system (see Fig. 3-4-5-1).
Level Level allowed modify the CNC status parameters, data parameters, tool

offset data, and transfer PLC ladder diagrams.

and pitch compensation.

Level Without password level, the tool compensation data and macro variables are
modifiable, the operation the machine operation panel can performed, but the
CNC status parameters, data parameters and pitch compensation data are not
modifiable.

9.1 Machine Zero (Mechanical Zero) Concept
The machine tool coordinate system the inherent coordinate system the machine tool. The
origin the machine tool coordinate system called the mechanical zero (or machine tool zero).
also called the reference point this manual. the mechanical origin specified the machine tool
builder and usually installed the maximum travel the positive direction the X-axis, Y-axis,
Z-axis, the 4th axis, and the 5th axis. When the numerical control device powered on, the
mechanical zero not known, and automatic manual zeroing required generally.

Note during the period from program segment retrieval restart the execution restarting the program,
not execute reset. Otherwise, the program start must re-executed from the first step.
Note the machine not provided with the absolute position detector (absolute encoder), the reference point
return must performed before restart and after power-on.
Note the program restart function does not support programs containing subprograms;
Note the program restart function does not support programs with rotation, mirroring, scaling, and polar
coordinate modes;
Note the program restart function does not support fixed cycle program;
Note the program restart function does not support DNC online processing program;
Note the program restart function does not support macroprogram (including Class Class B).

0400 Shape matching parameter
Setting range: 0.0020~99.0000
Shape matching parameter (#400) analyzes shape error, optimize shape and keep error within
allowed range based initial spline.
The larger the parameter, the larger the error. The smaller the parameter, the smaller the error.
0401 Shape matching limit
Setting range: 1.0000~999.000
Shape matching limit parameter (#401) limits increase shape error due curvature
optimization during speed matching calculation.
0402 Speed matching parameter
342

--- Page 359 ---
Appendix List GSK218MC Parameters
Setting range: 0.0020 一 99.0000
Speed matching parameter (#402) optimizes curvature smooth speed with curvature radiating
radially along normal direction every point the curve.
The larger the parameter, the lower the curvature optimization degree, the larger the accelerated
speed and the shorter the machining time.
The smaller the parameter, the high the curvature optimization degree and the longer the machining
time.
0403 Small line fitting segment number
Setting range: 0.0020~999.0000
This parameter (#403) determines the number cutter location points the spline curve fitted.
Such parameter should kept within certain range.
#403 1~10 The larger the parameter, the larger the calculated amount and smaller the shape error.
The smaller the parameter, the smaller the calculated amount and the larger the shape
error.
0404 Spline coefficient
Setting range: 1.0000~ 199.0000
0405 Spline coefficient
Setting range: 1.0000~ 199.0000
0406 Spline coefficient
Setting range: 1.0000~ 199.0000
Fit initial cubic spline curve based spline coefficients n1, and (#404, #405 and #406). The
larger the spline coefficients and (#404 and #405), the larger the curve error. But speed
smooth and machine tool runs stably. The smaller the coefficient, the smaller the curve error. But
speed not smooth and machine tool vibrates. Spline coefficient (#406) the opposite.

position confirmation signal. The system detects both the traditional spindle servo drive
orientation signal and the spindle orientation mechanical position confirmation signal during

positioning detection switch based upon the actual case the machine spindle, (It
recommended adopt the approximate switch value M8, and the detection distance
more than 1mm). Which detection method (concave protrude) decided the machine

close mode the detection switch (The factory default parameter 3004.7=0, constant open
switch, concave detection). the constant close switch and performed concave
detection, set the PC3004.7=1 (that reverse).
